meanings.definition: Of or relating to the microscopic structure of tissues
meanings.sent1: The histologic examination revealed detailed information about the tissue's tiny parts.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use histologic techniques to study the small details of cells and tissues.
meanings.sent3: The histologic investigation of the tissue under the microscope was like solving a tiny puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to histologic details was as sharp as a magnifying glass on a small object.
meanings.sent5: The histologic features of the tissue were so clear, it was like looking at a miniature world.

meanings.definition: The study of the microscopic structure of tissues
meanings.sent1: Histologic involves examining tissues under a microscope to understand their structure.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in histologic analyze cells and tissues to learn about their composition.
meanings.sent3: Studying histologic can be like exploring a tiny universe hidden within our bodies.
meanings.sent4: In histologic, tissues are like intricate mosaics waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The secrets of the body are unveiled through the lens of histologic studies.
